Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 69th/Ada
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, Loomis, 67th, Racine and 69th, due to police activity near 69th/Ada.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 69th, Loomis, 67th, Racine, then resume their normal route at 69th, due to police activity near 69th/Ada.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 79th/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Greenwood, 76th, Stony Island, 79th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 79th/Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.
